tool.name: histories
tool.command:
parsec histories update_dataset --history_id "$history_id" --dataset_id "$dataset_id"
#if $annotation --annotation "$annotation" #end if #if $deleted --deleted "$deleted" #end if #if $genome_build --genome_build "$genome_build" #end if #if $name --name "$name" #end if #if $visible --visible "$visible" #end if
| jq -S . > $results

input.name: annotation
input.help: Replace history dataset annotation with given string

input.name: deleted
input.help: Mark or unmark history dataset as deleted

input.name: name
input.help: Replace history dataset name with the given string

input.name: visible
input.help: Mark or unmark history dataset as visible

tool.help: Update history dataset metadata. Some of the attributes that can be modified are documented below.
